title-group.article-title: NEWTON IN THE SCHOOL OF TIME: THE "CHRONOLOGY OF ANCIENT KINGDOMS AMENDED" AND THE CRISIS OF SEVENTEENTH-CENTURY HISTORIOGRAPHY
